about.title: About
about.aboutMBTIDesc1: MBTI (Myers-Briggs Type Indicator) is a personality type assessment tool developed based on Carl Jung's psychological type theory.
about.aboutMBTIDesc2: The test evaluates personality types through four dimensions (Extraversion/Introversion, Sensing/Intuition, Thinking/Feeling, Judging/Perceiving), which can combine into 16 different personality types.
about.disclaimerDesc: This application is for entertainment and self-exploration purposes only. The test results do not constitute any professional psychological diagnosis. Please consult a professional for psychological assessment.
